HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: IMPORTANT |There is a bug in the previous version which causes Reunion to not continue after failed/aborted events (Downed Refugee, Prisoner Rescue). Use the debug option [Force Start Reunion Event] to force a new Reunion event if you have not been getting events after failing/aborting the last one. |CHANGES |- Downed/Prisoner pawns now spawn with clothes to prevent hypothermia. - Fix for bug mentioned above. - Added debug option to forcefully start a Reunion event. - Added HugsLib dependency so we can show THIS popup.
